duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage inventory, storage, cataloging, and property utilization for supply activities related to logistics operations.
Comply with supply regulations, policies, and procedures to ensure efficient supply management.
Interact with operating officials to address inventory requirements and identify new items for the system.
Schedule and issue aircraft inspections and work orders.
Perform clerical duties such as filing, typing, preparing reports, and maintaining logbooks and records.
Track and validate technical directives, life limit components, and flight data.
Maintain engine logbooks and associated aircraft records.
Ensure compliance with security clearance and safety regulations.
Participate in the training and qualification of new personnel and promote communication for accident prevention and quality work.
Obtain and maintain a Tier 3 US Government Clearance.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Minimum of three (3) years of production/planning data accumulation and reporting in logistics operations required.
